肕字的基本解释

肕
rèn
古同“韧”，柔韧：“筋肕而骨强。”

肕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rèn］
［《廣韻》而振切，去震，日。］
亦作“肕1”。“韧1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)柔软而坚实，不易折断。
(2)指意志坚忍不拔。

肕字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　肕； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页973第24
【廣韻】而振切，音刃。【玉篇】堅肉也。【廣韻】牢肕。【類篇】堅柔也。【管子·心術篇】人能正靜者，筋肕而骨强。【註】肕筋，堅也。

肕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
肕字的起名意思

暂无。

Hug
Basic explanation of words
Hug
rèn
Gu Tong is "tough" and pliable: "The tendons and bones are strong."
Hug
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rèn］
["Guangyun" and vibrate, go to vibrate, day. ]
Also known as "肕1". Traditional Chinese characters for "resistance 1". Also known as "1".
(1) Soft and firm, not easy to break.
(2) Refers to perseverance in will.
Hug
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　肕; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 973 24
[Guang Yun] And vibrating, sound blade. [Jade articles] Hard meat too. 【Guangyun】Follow tightly. 【Classes】Tough and soft. [Pipe·Heart Technique] People who can be calm, tendons and bones are strong. [Note] The girdle tendons are firm.
